Lauren Blake is a graduate student in the Department of Human Genetics at the University of Chicago. She is supported by the National Science Foundation's Graduate Research Fellowship (NSF-GRFP). 

Data collection and preliminary analysis was performed by Dr. Julien Roux. He is currently in the Department of Ecology and Evolution at the Universite de Lausanne, Switzerland.
